Shorenetworking Solutions Tinton Falls NJ 2015 to Present Key responsibilities Installation troubleshooting and repair of network hardware which includes routers 1900 2900 3500 and switches 2900 3500 3700 3800 Configuring and troubleshooting traffic using EIGRP OSPF protocols Configured AccessControl Lists ACL to allow or block users to access different applications on Cisco ASA and checkpoint
